faqs.question: How do I join ACM Chapter?
faqs.answer: You can join by clicking the 'Join Now' button on our website or attending our next event. Membership is open to all students interested in computing and technology.

faqs.question: When are the events held?
faqs.answer: We host events throughout the semester, typically on weekends or weekday evenings. Check our Events page for the latest schedule and registration details.

faqs.question: How can I become a team member?
faqs.answer: Interested in joining our leadership team? Reach out to us at contact@acmchapter.org or attend our recruitment events. We're always looking for passionate volunteers!

faqs.question: Do you offer mentorship programs?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a mentorship program connecting experienced members with newcomers. Fill out the mentorship form on our Membership page to get started.

faqs.question: Can I sponsor an event?
faqs.answer: We welcome sponsors. Contact us at sponsors@acmchapter.org to discuss sponsorship opportunities and benefits.

faqs.question: How do I get research published?
faqs.answer: We support research through our publication program. Submit your work through our Research portal or email research@acmchapter.org for more information.

faqs.question: What projects are you currently working on?
faqs.answer: We have several ongoing projects in ML, web development, and systems. Visit our Projects page to see details and contribution opportunities.

faqs.question: How can I volunteer?
faqs.answer: We're always looking for volunteers! Contact us at volunteer@acmchapter.org or fill out the volunteer form on our website.

faqs.question: Is there a newsletter?
faqs.answer: Yes! Subscribe to our newsletter to get updates on events, news, and opportunities. Sign up in the footer of our website.

faqs.question: What is the membership fee?
faqs.answer: ACM Chapter membership is free and open to all. We're committed to making computing accessible to everyone.
